name: Nikola Svobodová
short_desc_en: While Nikola studies Computer Science at CTU and Mathematics at MFF UK, she has previously worked as a researcher at the experimental molbio-biochem laboratory. Currently, she is responsible for the backend development of our products.
short_desc_cs: Nikola pracuje na vývoji backendu našich aplikací. Studuje Informatiku na FIT ČVUT a zároveň Obecnou matematiku na MFF UK. V minulosti pracovala jako researcher v biochem/molbio výzkumné laboratoři.
